title.rendered: Cerus Markets Launches MetaTrader 5 with New Crypto vs. TradFi Offerings

content.rendered:
Cerus Markets has introduced MetaTrader 5 (MT5) to its users, enhancing its comprehensive trading platform.

Traders using MT5 with Cerus Markets gain access to advanced trading tools, analytical capabilities, and a broader range of financial markets, including unique cryptocurrency and traditional financial pairings.

MT5 Bridges the Gap Between Crypto and Traditional Finance

Michael Brescia, CEO of Cerus Markets, stated, “The introduction of MT5 is a key milestone for Cerus Markets and our clients. We continuously strive to enhance our platform, offering traders advanced tools and opportunities. MT5 perfectly aligns with our mission to integrate cryptocurrency and traditional financial markets.”

MetaTrader 5 supports trading in forex, stocks, commodities, and cryptocurrencies. This will attract loyal MT5 users interested in Cerus Markets’ offerings, which include several financial instruments pairing crypto tokens with traditional assets.

MetaTrader 5 features over 80 technical indicators and tools, an integrated economic calendar, and supports both traditional and algorithmic trading.

In addition to exclusive crypto vs. traditional asset pairings, Cerus Markets is celebrating the MT5 launch with a 100% deposit bonus for traders.

Cerus Markets is a brokerage firm regulated by the Malaysia Labuan FSA (License No.: MB/22/0101). Established in 2022, Cerus Markets offers cryptocurrency trading against various instruments, including commodities, equities, indices, and forex.

Cerus provides unique crypto derivative products, allowing clients to trade over 200 instruments paired with cryptocurrencies. Besides crypto derivatives, Cerus offers trading opportunities in FX, commodities, indices, and single stocks. The broker does not charge entry fees and enables trading of digital assets starting from $50, with leverage up to 400:1.
